src:
Kekovi alternativi tudi Vučkić in Rep
Slovenski nogometaši priprave za Latvijo in Poljsko začenjajo v Kopru. Selektor tokrat ne računa na Črnigoja, Bezjaka in Zahovića.
06 Nov 2019, 06:52 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA – Martin Milec, Haris Vučkić, Rajko Rep in Amedej Vetrih so nova imena v kadru slovenske nogometne reprezentance, seveda v primerjavi z zadnjo akcijo v Skopju in Stožicah. Selektor Matjaž Kek je uresničil napoved o osvežitvi izbrane vrste, ki bo prihodnji teden na Obali odprla priprave za zadnje dejanje boja za euro 2020: tekmi z Latvijo (16. 11.) in Poljsko (19. 11.).Kek ne bo računal na Domna Črnigoja, Romana Bezjaka in Luko Zahovića, ki so (bili) poškodovani, prav tako je – zavoljo kazni po rdečem kartonu – neuporaben Denis Popović. Selektor je razkril, kaj bo iskal v prihajajočih tekmah proti najslabši in najboljši reprezentanci v skupini G (Poljska 19, Avstrija 16, S. Makedonija, Slovenija in Izrael po 11, Latvija 0).»Na obeh bočnih položajih se soočamo z določenimi izzivi in v tem kontekstu vidim eno od možnih rešitev Milca, ki redno igra v zadnjem obdobju. Tudi na drugih položajih nazadnje nismo blesteli. Vetrih in Rep? Amedej igra s polno minutažo v turškem prvenstvu in si gotovo zasluži priložnost, Rajko pa v avstrijski ligi, v kateri že dlje deluje dobro. Lahko je ustrezna alternativa za Bezjaka, ki je poškodovan. Vučkić? O Harisu ste novinarji tako ali tako že vse napisali. Vesel sem, da se je tako nadarjen nogometaš vrnil na sceno po težkem obdobju s poškodbami. Zasluži si priložnost,« je selektor končal opisovanje svežih imen z Vučkićem, ki opozarja nase v nizozemskem prvenstvu. V tej sezoni je v majici Twenteja zbral šest golov in podajo.Tudi Oblak, Iličić in ŠporarMatjaž Kek je za tekmi z Latvijo (16. 11.) in Poljsko (19. 11.) kljub osvežitvam vpoklical večino preverjenih imen, tudi prve zvezdnike reprezentance, kot so Jan Oblak, Josip Iličić in Andraž Šporar. Kekov seznam, vratarji: Oblak (Atletico), Belec (Apoel), Vidmar (Olimpija); branilci: Jokić (Ufa), Mevlja (Soči), Struna (Houston), Stojanović (Dinamo Z.), Milec (Maribor), Balkovec (Empoli), Blažič (Ferencvaros), Korun (Piast Gliwice); vezisti: Iličić (Atalanta), Kurtić (Spal), Krhin (Nantes), Verbič (Dinamo K.), Zajc (Fenerbahče), Bijol (CSKA), Vetrih (Rizespor), Majer (Lecce), Rep (Hartberg); napadalci: Matavž (Vitesse), Berić (St. Etienne), Šporar (Slovan Bratislava), Vučkić (Twente).Bomo videli, kdo bo dobil v naslednjih tednih pravo priložnost za kaj več v majici reprezentance A. Ni namreč posebej verjetno, da bo Kek eksperimentiral v vendarle najresnejših tekmah z Latvijo in Poljsko. To nam je povedal v nedeljo, enako je ponovil tudi med včerajšnjim pogovorom na Brdu pri Kranju: »Cikel boja za euro 2020 želim končati s fanti, ki so bili nosilci igre že doslej.«Brdo pri Kranju ne predstavlja le zgodbe o uspešno zgrajenem vadbenem središču, marveč tudi žalostinko o bližnjem hotelu Kokra, katerega bližnja prihodnost ni znana. Ne gre le za najboljše slovenske nogometaše in njihove tekmece: usoda objekta, s katerim bi se lahko ponašali tudi med predsedovanjem Evropski uniji, ostaja negotova. Malokdo pozna konec birokratske sage, ki bi omogočila njegovo prenovo.Kakor koli, posledično – in zavoljo umetne razsvetljave – bo tudi reprezentanca tokrat vadila na Obali, ne na Gorenjskem. Simbolično tudi za Vučkića, ki je edinkrat oblekel majico selekcije A prav na prijateljski tekmi s Škotsko v Kopru, ko je vodil ekipo selektor Slaviša Stojanović.
text:
Kek's alternatives also include Vuckic and Rep
Slovenian football players start preparations for Latvia and Poland in Koper. The selector this time does not count on Crnigo, Bezjak and Zahovic.
06 Nov 2019, 06:52 by Jernej Suhadolnik
LJUBLJANA - Martin Milec, Haris Vuckic, Rajko Rep and Amedej Vetrih are new names on the Slovenian football team, compared to the last campaign in Skopje and Stozice. Selector Matjaz Kek has made an announcement about the refreshment of the selected species, which will open preparations for the last act of fighting for the Euro 2020 fight next week on the Coast: matches with Latvia (16 November) and Poland (19 November). Dom Crgigo, Roman Bezjak and Luka Zahovic, who were (were) injured, also - for the sake of the red card penalty - was no longer useful to Denis Popovic. The coach has revealed what he will look for in the upcoming games against the worst and best national team in Group G (Poland 19, Austria 16, S. Macedonia, Slovenia and Israel 11, Latvia 0). ”In both lateral positions we face certain challenges and in this context, I see one possible solution of Milc playing regularly in the recent period. In other positions, too, we did not shine last. Winds and Tails? Amedej plays full-time in the Turkish Championship and certainly deserves a chance, and Rajko in the Austrian league, where he has been doing well for a long time. It may be a suitable alternative for Bezjak who is injured. Vuckic? You've written everything about Harris anyway. I am so glad that such a talented footballer returned to the scene after a difficult period with injuries. It deserves a chance, ”the selector ended up describing fresh names with Vuckic, who points to himself in the Dutch Championship. He has scored six goals and goals this season in a Twente T-shirt.Also Oblak, Ilicic and SporarMatjaz Kek has called up most of the names that have been checked, including the first national team stars, despite matches with Latvia (16/11) and Poland (19/11). , such as Jan Oblak, Josip Ilicic and Andraz Sporar. Kek's list, goalkeepers: Cloud (Atletico), Belec (Apoel), Vidmar (Olympia); defenders: Jokic (Ufa), Mevlja (Sochi), Struna (Houston), Stojanovic (Dinamo Z.), Milec (Maribor), Balkovec (Empoli), Blazic (Ferencvaros), Korun (Piast Gliwice); midfielders: Ilicic (Atalanta), Kurtic (Spal), Krchin (Nantes), Verbich (Dynamo K.), Zajc (Fenerbahce), Biyol (CSKA), Vetrich (Rizespor), Mayer (Lecce), Rep (Hartberg); attackers: Matavz (Vitesse), Beric (St. Etienne), Spor (Slovan Bratislava), Vuckic (Twente). We will see who will get a real chance in the next few weeks in team jersey A. It is not particularly likely that Kek will experiment in the most serious matches with Latvia and Poland. He told us this on Sunday, and he repeated the same thing during yesterday's talk at Brdo pri Kranju: "I want to end the cycle of fighting for Euro 2020 with the guys who have been the winners of the game so far." center, but also sadness about the nearby Kokra Hotel, whose near future is unknown. It is not only about the best Slovenian footballers and their competitors: the fate of the facility, which they could also be proud of during the EU Presidency, remains uncertain. Few people know the end of the bureaucratic saga that would allow it to be renewed. However, as a result - and for the sake of artificial lighting - this time the national team will also practice on the Coast, not in the Gorenjska region. Symbolic also for Vuckic, who once wore a selection A jersey at a friendly match with Scotland in Koper, when he led the team of selectman Slavisa Stojanovic.
